We're leaving you behind!\""},{"lineNumber":162770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...!\""},{"lineNumber":162771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":162772,"originalJapaneseLine":"村のことが気になるのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps battlefield east of Scale—"},{"lineNumber":162776,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍と魔軍の今日の戦闘、","translatedEnglishLine":"Today's battle between the Reesus army and the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":162777,"originalJapaneseLine":"主役はなにを置いても――","translatedEnglishLine":"No matter what, the star was—"},{"lineNumber":162778,"originalJapaneseLine":"新しく現れた魔人、レキシントンだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the newly appeared demon, Lexington."},{"lineNumber":162779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、来るぞ、来るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, here it comes, here it comes!\""},{"lineNumber":162780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総員、ガーーーード！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, guaaarrrd!\""},{"lineNumber":162781,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぬっ、と鬼が姿を見せる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, the demon cm)."},{"lineNumber":162783,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭には二本の角、筋骨隆々の体は赤褐色、","translatedEnglishLine":"Two horns on her head, a muscular reddish-brown body,"},{"lineNumber":162784,"originalJapaneseLine":"双眸はギョロリと動き、緑に禍々しく輝く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her bulging eyes moved about, glowing ominously green."},{"lineNumber":162785,"originalJapaneseLine":"両手に携えた金棒は","translatedEnglishLine":"The golden rods held in both hands"},{"lineNumber":162786,"originalJapaneseLine":"人には到底扱えぬと思わせるほど","translatedEnglishLine":"were so large that it was unimaginable for a human to wield them."},{"lineNumber":162787,"originalJapaneseLine":"三尺ほどの巨大さを有していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were about three shaku (approx. 90 cm) in size."},{"lineNumber":162788,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは、一目で異形、化け物のたぐいと知れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At a glance, it was clear she was a monstrous, grotesque creature."},{"lineNumber":162789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うがぁぁぁぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":162790,"originalJapaneseLine":"鬼――魔人レキシントンは","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon — demon Lexington"},{"lineNumber":162791,"originalJapaneseLine":"体ごとひねり金棒を横に打ち払う。","translatedEnglishLine":"twisted her body and swung her golden rod sideways to strike away."},{"lineNumber":162792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":162793,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人の攻撃に備え防御していたにも関わらず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though they were defending against the demon's attack,"},{"lineNumber":162794,"originalJapaneseLine":"その防御ごと砕くような","translatedEnglishLine":"her blow shattered their defenses utterly,"},{"lineNumber":162795,"originalJapaneseLine":"豪快極まりない攻撃でリーザス兵が吹き飛ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and with an extremely powerful attack, Reesus soldiers were blasted away."},{"lineNumber":162796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……ふふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":162797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははっ、まるで玩具みたい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, they're just like toys...\""},{"lineNumber":162798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「があああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":162799,"originalJapaneseLine":"一振り、二振り、","translatedEnglishLine":"One swing, two swings,"},{"lineNumber":162800,"originalJapaneseLine":"人並み外れた怪力から放たれるその重さ、","translatedEnglishLine":"the incredible strength behind each heavy strike,"},{"lineNumber":162801,"originalJapaneseLine":"到底人に受けられるものではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"was something no human could endure."},{"lineNumber":162802,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果、体中の骨を鎧ごと砕かれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, bones throughout their bodies, along with their armor, were shattered,"},{"lineNumber":162803,"originalJapaneseLine":"多くの兵が血煙に沈んでいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"and many soldiers fell bleeding."},{"lineNumber":162804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、待避ー！　待避ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, fall back! Fall back!\""},{"lineNumber":162805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ちょっと、逃げないでよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, don't run away."},{"lineNumber":162806,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと遊びましょうよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's play a little more...\""},{"lineNumber":162807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":162808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".......\""},{"lineNumber":162809,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃げていく兵と入れ替わりに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Replacing the fleeing soldiers,"},{"lineNumber":162810,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に立っていたのは、赤将リック。","translatedEnglishLine":"standing there was the Red General Rick."},{"lineNumber":162811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――参るッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—I am coming!\""},{"lineNumber":162812,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックから放たれる斬撃が","translatedEnglishLine":"The slash released by Rick"},{"lineNumber":162813,"originalJapaneseLine":"まずレキシントンの顔を打った。","translatedEnglishLine":"first struck Lexington's face."},{"lineNumber":162814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったぁ、なによ、こいつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, what the heck is this?"},{"lineNumber":162815,"originalJapaneseLine":"こっ……――のぉ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-You...!\""},{"lineNumber":162816,"originalJapaneseLine":"工夫も何もない","translatedEnglishLine":"A simple, straightforward"},{"lineNumber":162817,"originalJapaneseLine":"上からの直線的な金棒の振り下ろし。","translatedEnglishLine":"overhead swing of the golden rod."},{"lineNumber":162818,"originalJapaneseLine":"鬼の怪力による金棒の一振りも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the demon's mighty hammer strike with the golden rod,"},{"lineNumber":162819,"originalJapaneseLine":"死神には届かない。","translatedEnglishLine":"did not reach the reaper."},{"lineNumber":162820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むー、けちけちした迷宮だ」
「結界が張られ中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A barrier has been erected, inside which

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れなくなっておりますな」
「う〜、もっと戦いたいのに〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I want to fight more though~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、終わったもんは仕方ない」
「では、改めてスケールの街を目指すぞー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, let's head for the city of Scale once again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ」
「おーい、メルフェイス！
なにしてる、置いてくぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing? We're leaving you behind!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村のことが気になるのか、
メルフェイスは憂い顔のままだった。
その頃――
スケール東の戦場――
リーザス軍と魔軍の今日の戦闘、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today's battle between the Reesus army and the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主役はなにを置いても――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter what, the star was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しく現れた魔人、レキシントンだった。
「うわ、来るぞ、来るぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, here it comes, here it comes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総員、ガーーーード！」
ぬっ、と鬼が姿を見せる。
身の丈六尺四寸はあろうかという天を衝く大女。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A towering giant woman, about six shaku and four sun tall (approx. 193 cm).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭には二本の角、筋骨隆々の体は赤褐色、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two horns on her head, a muscular reddish-brown body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 双眸はギョロリと動き、緑に禍々しく輝く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her bulging eyes moved about, glowing ominously green.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手に携えた金棒は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The golden rods held in both hands

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人には到底扱えぬと思わせるほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were so large that it was unimaginable for a human to wield them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三尺ほどの巨大さを有していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were about three shaku (approx. 90 cm) in size.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、一目で異形、化け物のたぐいと知れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At a glance, it was clear she was a monstrous, grotesque creature.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うがぁぁぁぁ！」
鬼――魔人レキシントンは
体ごとひねり金棒を横に打ち払う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: twisted her body and swung her golden rod sideways to strike away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃああああ！」
魔人の攻撃に備え防御していたにも関わらず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though they were defending against the demon's attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その防御ごと砕くような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her blow shattered their defenses utterly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪快極まりない攻撃でリーザス兵が吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with an extremely powerful attack, Reesus soldiers were blasted away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ……ふふっ……」
「ははっ、まるで玩具みたい……」
「があああああああ！」
一振り、二振り、
人並み外れた怪力から放たれるその重さ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the incredible strength behind each heavy strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底人に受けられるものではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was something no human could endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果、体中の骨を鎧ごと砕かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, bones throughout their bodies, along with their armor, were shattered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの兵が血煙に沈んでいく。
「くっ、待避ー！　待避ー！」
「……ちょっと、逃げないでよ。
もっと遊びましょうよ……」
逃げていく兵と入れ替わりに、
その場に立っていたのは、赤将リック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: standing there was the Red General Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックから放たれる斬撃が
まずレキシントンの顔を打った。
「ったぁ、なによ、こいつ。
こっ……――のぉ！」
工夫も何もない
上からの直線的な金棒の振り下ろし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overhead swing of the golden rod.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼の怪力による金棒の一振りも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the demon's mighty hammer strike with the golden rod,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死神には届かない。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though they were defending against the demon's attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その防御ごと砕くような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her blow shattered their defenses utterly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪快極まりない攻撃でリーザス兵が吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with an extremely powerful attack, Reesus soldiers were blasted away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果、体中の骨を鎧ごと砕かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, bones throughout their bodies, along with their armor, were shattered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの兵が血煙に沈んでいく。
「くっ、待避ー！　待避ー！」
「……ちょっと、逃げないでよ。
もっと遊びましょうよ……」
逃げていく兵と入れ替わりに、
その場に立っていたのは、赤将リック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: standing there was the Red General Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックから放たれる斬撃が
まずレキシントンの顔を打った。
「ったぁ、なによ、こいつ。
こっ……――のぉ！」
工夫も何もない
上からの直線的な金棒の振り下ろし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overhead swing of the golden rod.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼の怪力による金棒の一振りも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the demon's mighty hammer strike with the golden rod,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死神には届かない。
